channel.description: Recent content in fiber on UNBIASEDGEEK.COM

item.title: 10gbs Internets Is It Too Much
item.description: I found out recently that Utopia fired up the fiber in my neighborhood and I can get fiber internet. While a lot of people complain about Comcast my experience has been midling, not terrible and not great. I was fine up until I had a problem and had to tal to support, then it a was mightmarish. So the question is if 10 gigabit/sec internet is too much bandwdith. I mean it isn’t really a question.
